title: FedCDC: A Collaborative Framework for Data Consumers in Federated Learning Market
summary: Federated learning (FL) allows machine learning models to be trained on distributed datasets without directly accessing local data. In FL markets, numerous Data Consumers compete to recruit Data Owners for their respective training tasks, but budget constraints and competition can prevent them from securing sufficient data.
